original_text: Yes, they have paid money to get friends who will help them. But I will soon bring them together to punish them. A great king will be cruel to them and they will receive much pain. 8: The great king is the King of Assyria. Yes, they have paid money to get friends who will help them. But I will soon bring them together to punish them. A great king will be cruel to them and they will receive much pain. 8: The great king is the King of Assyria. A great king will be cruel to them and they will receive much pain. 8: The great king is the King of Assyria. Yes, they have paid money to get friends who will help them.
korean_text: 그들이 여러 나라에게 값을 주었을지라도 이제 내가 그들을 모으리니 그들은 지도자의 임금이 지워 준 짐으로 말미암아 쇠하기 시작하리라

sentences.original_text: Yes, they have paid money to get friends
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 그들은 친구를 얻기 위해 돈을 지불했습니다

sentences.original_text: But I will soon bring them together
A great king will be cruel to them
and they will receive much pain
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 큰 고통을 받을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The great king is the King of Assyria
